page.title: 02Principal Features E.Cdr./Kn
page.content: {ST.CUTHBERT'S CHURCH St.Cuthbert's 12th century church off the Main St is now in ruins. {ALMONDELL COUNTRY PARK Almondell is a country park on the banks of the River Almond which is visited by many people.They enjoy walking, fishing and looking at nature. {CAMPS INDUSTRIAL ESTATE Limestone was quarried on this site. The limestone was used in local buildings. { {KIRKNEWTON PARISH CHURCH The original church in Kirknewton was built in the 14th century and moved to its present site in the 17th century. {KIRKNEWTON STATION Kirknewton Station was originally called Midcalder Station and was built in the middle of the 19th century. Richard.
